name: Boy Hair Salon - hair design hairstyle - dad hair salon
name_original: Boy Hair Salon - hair design hairstyle - dad hair salon
description:
Do you want to be a barber?
Let's play the Hair Salon . To be a barber and design various hairstyles for your customer.
In this game there are hundreds of hair style, makeup, dressup, and accessories to choose from!
Let's play the Kids Hair Salon. To be a barber and design various hairstyles for your customer.
It's a fun game for kids.
